name: 1999 (Keith Wayne)
description:
DISCLAIMER: This game was meant to be played on laptop, or desktop. It will not function on a mobile device! 

This project is me. The aspects of me that I'm not aware of, that I don't like, that I adore, and that I'm curious about. This project is the work of world-building and spacial creation that expresses the person that I am within 200 Megabytes.

I divided the world into two worlds; Comfort and Music. Comfort showcases my work in the way I want to watch and provides a space that I see as homelike and reminiscent.  Music is central to my work and is central to my life, as I incorporate a collective of artists to showcase my tastes and what my ear is picking on. 

I'm also showcasing my constant strive towards excellence, and my constant lag behind what I can achieve in a reasonable time. I'm always working towards bettering myself and having mastery over myself and my work. Sometimes, a lot of times, I often feel like it could've been more.  This project feels just right for being a mirror.
